name: LD36 Scribe
description:
Pharaohs talk. They talk a lot, and it's your job as the trusty scribe to take down what he says!

As Pharaoh orders out so you must match what he says by matching 3 or more of the corresponding hieroglyph displayed in his speech bubble.

Music and SFX by:

http://www.ivosissolak.com/
